field.name: contact_name
field.label: Name
field.hoverover: Person we are attempting to contact/were contacted by

field.name: phone
field.label: Phone #
field.hoverover: Phone number dialed or number of caller(if known)

field.name: contact_success
field.label: Contact Successful?
field.hoverover: If the call was outbound, did you get ahold of someone who could help?

field.name: reason
field.label: Reasons for contact
field.hoverover: the principal reason or reasons contact was attempted

field.name: signature_box
field.label: Signature
field.hoverover: Sign here to signify all information in this form is correct
